<small>Aramaic form: [[H8406]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבַר‎</span><sub>148</sub> **verb** ==break, break in pieces== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֿבר‎</span>, ***break, destroy*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Hof. Mus., no. 1, l. 26</sup> [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>Hi 74</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***restrain, destroy***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּבַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šabâru***</u></abbr>, ***break, break in pieces***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break***); — 

**Qal**<sub>53</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.28|1Kgs 13:28]]; [[Isa.14.5|Isa 14:5]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁבֹּר‎</span> [[Jer.19.11|Jer 19:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺר‎</span>- [[Isa.42.3|Isa 42:3]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁבָּרֿ‎</span> [[Prov.25.15|Prov 25:15]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבֹר‎</span> [[Ps.10.15|Ps 10:15]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבְרֵם‎</span> [[Jer.17.18|Jer 17:18]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁבֹּר‎</span> [[Gen.19.9|Gen 19:9]] +2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוֺר‎</span> [[Jer.28.12|Jer 28:12]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁבֵר‎</span> [[Ezek.4.16|Ezek 4:16]] +2 t.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבוּר‎</span> [[Lev.22.22|Lev 22:22]], plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוּרֵי‎</span> [[Ps.147.3|Ps 147:3]] — ***break***, literally, object earthen vessel [[Judg.7.20|Judg 7:20]]; [[Lev.11.33|Lev 11:33]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Jer.19.11|Jer 19:11]] (in simile, compare v[[Jer.19.11|Jer 19:11]]; [[Jer.48.33|Jer 48:33]]; [[Isa.30.14|Isa 30:14]], flask [[Jer.19.10|Jer 19:10]], gate-bar [[Amos.1.5|Amos 1:5]] (in metaphor), bow [[Hos.1.5|Hos 1:5]]; [[Jer.49.35|Jer 49:35]], and sword [[Hos.2.20|Hos 2:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span>), bone of lamb [[Exod.12.46|Exod 12:46]]; [[Num.9.12|Num 9:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), and (in metaphor) [[Prov.25.15|Prov 25:15]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבוּר‎</span> i.e. fractured of limb [[Lev.22.22|Lev 22:22]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), yoke [[Jer.28.10|Jer 28:10]]; [[Jer.28.12|Jer 28:12]]; [[Jer.28.13|Jer 28:13]], and, in metaphor, of deliverance (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject) v[[Jer.28.2|Jer 28:2]] v[[Jer.28.4|Jer 28:4]] v[[Jer.28.11|Jer 28:11]]; [[Jer.38.8|Jer 38:8]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>), +4 t., of rebellion [[Jer.2.20|Jer 2:20]]; [[Jer.5.5|Jer 5:5]], so staff [[Isa.14.5|Isa 14:5]] +5 t., reed [[Isa.42.3|Isa 42:3]], arm of Pharaoh [[Ezek.30.21|Ezek 30:21]]; [[Ezek.30.22|Ezek 30:22]]; [[Ezek.30.24|Ezek 30:24]] compare [[Ps.10.15|Ps 10:15]] trees (subject thunder) [[Ps.29.5|Ps 29:5]] ***break in, down***, door [[Gen.19.9|Gen 19:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***rend violently*** (of lion), man [[1Kgs.13.26|1Kgs 13:26]], ass v[[1Kgs.13.28|1Kgs 13:28]] ***wreck*** Tyre (as ship) [[Ezek.27.26|Ezek 27:26]] figurative ***break*** pride [[Lev.26.19|Lev 26:19]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); ***crush*** (figurative) [[Isa.14.25|Isa 14:25]] (compare [[Jer.48.28|Jer 48:28]] above), [[Lam.1.15|Lam 1:15]]; [[Dan.11.26|Dan 11:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁנֶה שִׁבָּרוֺן שׁ‎</span> [[Jer.17.18|Jer 17:18]] ***break, rupture***, heart (figurative) [[Ps.69.21|Ps 69:21]]+ [[Ezek.6.9|Ezek 6:9]] (see **Niph\`al** ***near the end***), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוּרֵי לֵב‎</span> [[Ps.147.3|Ps 147:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶשְׁבֹּר עָלָיו חֻקִּי‎</span> [[Job.38.10|Job 38:10]] ***broke for it my boundary***, of sea, reference to abrupt ending of mainland; = ***quench*** thirst (***frangere sitim***) [[Ps.104.11|Ps 104:11]]. **Niph\`al**<sub>57</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבַּר‎</span> [[Exod.22.9|Exod 22:9]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁבֵר‎</span> [[Lev.6.21|Lev 6:21]] +, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתִשָּׁ֫בֶר‎</span> [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשָּׁבֵר‎</span> [[Ezek.29.7|Ezek 29:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַבר‎</span>- [[Ezek.32.28|Ezek 32:28]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשָּׁבֵר‎</span> [[Jonah.1.4|Jonah 1:4]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבָּר‎</span> [[Ps.51.19|Ps 51:19]], feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבָּרָה‎</span> v[[Ps.51.19|Ps 51:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבֶּ֫רֵת‎</span> [[Ezek.27.34|Ezek 27:34]] +, etc.; — ***be broken***, of neck [[1Sam.4.18|1Sam 4:18]], bones [[Ps.34.21|Ps 34:21]], gate-bars [[Jer.51.30|Jer 51:30]], rod (in figurative) [[Isa.14.21|Isa 14:21]]; [[Jer.48.17|Jer 48:17]], idols [[Ezek.6.4|Ezek 6:4]]; [[Ezek.6.6|Ezek 6:6]], horn [[Dan.8.8|Dan 8:8]], compare v[[Dan.8.22|Dan 8:22]], arm [[Job.31.22|Job 31:22]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקָּנָה‎</span>), and (in metaphor) [[Jer.48.25|Jer 48:25]]; [[Job.38.15|Job 38:15]]; [[Ps.37.17|Ps 37:17]], compare [[Ezek.30.22|Ezek 30:22]], bough [[Ezek.31.12|Ezek 31:12]]; [[Isa.27.11|Isa 27:11]], compare (figurative) of wickedness, like a tree [[Job.24.20|Job 24:20]], other things [[Ps.37.15|Ps 37:15]]; [[Jer.50.23|Jer 50:23]]; [[Ezek.29.7|Ezek 29:7]]; [[Ps.124.7|Ps 124:7]] cisterns [[Jer.2.13|Jer 2:13]] (***id.***), pottery [[Lev.6.21|Lev 6:21]]; [[Lev.15.12|Lev 15:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]] (in figurative); = ***be maimed, crippled*** (have limb broken), of animal [[Exod.22.9|Exod 22:9]]; [[Exod.22.13|Exod 22:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), and (figurative) [[Ezek.34.4|Ezek 34:4]]; [[Ezek.34.16|Ezek 34:16]]; [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]], so (figurative of men stumbling) [[Isa.8.15|Isa 8:15]]; [[Isa.28.13|Isa 28:13]] ***be wrecked***, of ships [[1Kgs.22.49|1Kgs 22:49]] (read [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁבְּרוּ‎</span>), \|\| [[2Chr.20.37|2Chr 20:37]]; [[Jonah.1.4|Jonah 1:4]], metaphor of Tyre [[Ezek.27.34|Ezek 27:34]] figurative be ***crushed***, destroyed (person, warriors, kingdoms, etc.), [[Jer.14.17|Jer 14:17]]; [[Jer.22.20|Jer 22:20]]; [[Jer.48.4|Jer 48:4]]; [[Jer.51.8|Jer 51:8]] + 10 t.; figurative ***be broken***, of heart [[Jer.23.9|Jer 23:9]]; [[Isa.61.1|Isa 61:1]]; [[Ps.34.19|Ps 34:19]]; [[Ps.51.19|Ps 51:19]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ נִשׁ‎</span> v[[Ps.34.19|Ps 34:19]]. — [[Exod.6.9|Exod 6:9]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּ֫י‎</span> ([[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]); [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשָׁבְרִי‎</span>. **Pi\`el**<sub>36</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבַּר‎</span> [[Isa.21.9|Isa 21:9]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבֵּ֑ר‎</span> [[Exod.9.25|Exod 9:25]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁבֵּר‎</span> [[Ps.46.10|Ps 46:10]] +, 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁבֵּר֑וּן‎</span> [[Exod.34.13|Exod 34:13]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁבֵּר‎</span> [[Exod.23.24|Exod 23:24]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁבֵּר‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.11|1Kgs 19:11]] — ***shatter, break***, tablets [[Exod.32.19|Exod 32:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.34.1|Exod 34:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.9.17|Deut 9:17]]; [[Deut.10.2|Deut 10:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצֵּבוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.23.24|Exod 23:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + Infinitive absolute), [[Exod.34.13|Exod 34:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) + 7 t.; images [[2Kgs.11.18|2Kgs 11:18]] + 3 t.; bronze sea, etc., [[2Kgs.25.13|2Kgs 25:13]] = [[Jer.52.17|Jer 52:17]] horns [[Dan.8.7|Dan 8:7]] jaws [[Job.29.17|Job 29:17]] (in figurative); of hail ***shattering*** tree [[Exod.9.25|Exod 9:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[1Kgs.19.11|1Kgs 19:11]] elsewhere subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, ***shattering*** gate-bars, etc., weapons [[Isa.45.2|Isa 45:2]]; [[Isa.38.13|Isa 38:13]]; [[Lam.2.9|Lam 2:9]]; [[Lam.3.4|Lam 3:4]]; [[Ps.46.10|Ps 46:10]]; [[Ps.76.4|Ps 76:4]]; [[Ps.107.16|Ps 107:16]], trees [[Ps.29.5|Ps 29:5]]; [[Ps.105.33|Ps 105:33]], heads of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּינִים‎</span> [[Ps.74.13|Ps 74:13]] ***wrecking*** ship [[Ps.48.8|Ps 48:8]]. **Hiph\`il** ***cause to break out***, i.e. ***bring to the birth***, ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַאֲנִי אַשְׁבִּיר וְלֹא אוֺלִיד‎</span> [[Isa.66.9|Isa 66:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁבֵּר‎</span> below). **Hoph\`al** ***be broken, shattered*** (in heart), ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלשֶֿׁבֶר בַּתעַֿמִּי הָשְׁבַּ֑רְתִּי‎</span> [[Jer.8.21|Jer 8:21]]. 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁבוּר‎</span> [[Lev.22.22|Lev 22:22]] see √ **Qal.**
